amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding (by offset) for the Urban Area Security Initiative by $22 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for the Office of the Under Secretary for Management by $5 million and the Office of the Chief Financial Officer by $10 million, US Customs and Border Patrol Salaries and Expenses by $2 million, Federal Emergency Management Agency Salaries and Expenses by $5 million, and increase funds for Federal Emergency Management Agency State and Local Projects by $22 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Heck (NV) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 268 (Roll no. 196).
